Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer in the first inning
The Guardians scored five runs without recording an out in the first inning
Emmanuel Clase completed a four-hit shutout
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians earned a bye to reach the ALDS by finishing with the second best record in the league
The Tigers came off a two-game sweep of Houston in the wild card series
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Stephen Vogt praised the team's early lead and motivation
Tiger manager A.J. Hinch acknowledged the difficulty of overcoming an early five-run deficit
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on a sunny Saturday afternoon
Cade Smith entered the game in the fifth inning to pitch for the first time in the postseason
